meanings.definition: A person or thing that omits something.
meanings.sent1: The omitter of the group forgot to include an important detail.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reminded the omitter to turn in their homework on time.
meanings.sent3: The little omitter in the storybook always left out the ending of the tales.
meanings.sent4: The omitter in the meeting was like a silent shadow, unnoticed but impactful.
meanings.sent5: The omitter's absence in the recipe resulted in a bland dish.
